attributes.action: ensure that all MPs have ample opportunity to read the Digital Econhomy Bill before voting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been reported that the British Phonographic Institute (UK recording industry lobby group) have circulated an email saying that the Digital Economy Bill must be rammed through.  Reports state that they fear that if MPs have a chance to read the bill they will vote against it.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
